title: Improvements for Go and IDE
body:
### What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
I don't use Go

### What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
I don't use Go

### What did you do?
I thought a lot about programming languages.

### What did you expect to see?
Something like my presentation:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aQHtIouaYzA
I'm open to discus it.

### What did you see instead?
Typical source code.
